info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 19 at 4:25PM CDT until April 19 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR EASTERN LEE AND SOUTHERN DE KALB COUNTIES... At 425 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Paw Paw, or near Shabbona, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... DeKalb, Sandwich, Shabbona, Hinckley, Somonauk, Waterman, Maple Park, Paw Paw, Lee, Compton, Steward and West Brooklyn. This includes... Sandwich Fairgrounds. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 78 and 94. I-88 near mile marker 94, and between mile markers 98 and 101. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
